summary: Implements a WebSocket client for Poloniex futures that manages connection setup, message negotiation, subscription handling, and parsing of realâ€‘time market data (order books, tickers, trades) as well as account information (balances, orders) and authentication.
business_intent: Enables trading applications and bots to receive live futures market updates and perform order and balance operations on Poloniex, supporting automated trading, monitoring, and analytics.
